'''Eofania''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

A crafty Vailian trader who picked out a prime spot among the Huana to sell her goods to them and then resell them to the Vailians.

## Interactions

{{Interactions
|companion       =
|wares           = Food and Huana gear. Includes [Shorewalker Sandals](/shorewalkerSandals/). Her trading hours are from 8:00am till 5:00pm.
|stronghold      =
|rest            =
|quests_started  =
|quests_involved = [Burning Bridges](/burningBridges/)
|none            = 
|other           = 
}}

## =Quests

=
* [Burning Bridges](/burningBridges/): She witnessed the rather one-sided fight between [Rinco](/rinco/) and [Mokeha](/mokeha/), and while it was entertaining, she doesn't know exactly how it started. You can pickpocket or obtain a [Huana Carving](/huanaCarving/) from her to trade with Mokeha.
[Category:Port Maje characters](/categoryPortMajeCharacters/)
[Category:Sātahuzi characters](/categorySatahuziCharacters/)

'''Eofania''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

==Background==
A crafty Vailian trader who picked out a prime spot among the Huana to sell her goods to them and then resell them to the Vailians.

==Interactions==
{{Interactions
|companion       =
|wares           = Food and Huana gear. Includes [[Shorewalker Sandals]]. Her trading hours are from 8:00am till 5:00pm.
|stronghold      =
|rest            =
|quests_started  =
|quests_involved = [[Burning Bridges]]
|none            = 
|other           = 
}}

===Quests===
* [[Burning Bridges]]: She witnessed the rather one-sided fight between [[Rinco]] and [[Mokeha]], and while it was entertaining, she doesn't know exactly how it started. You can pickpocket or obtain a [[Huana Carving]] from her to trade with Mokeha.
[[Category:Port Maje characters]]
[[Category:Sātahuzi characters]]
